entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
